history.narrative: Law 3-101 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-292, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 17, 1980 and July 1, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 16, 1980, it was assigned Act No. 3-223 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
